src_original: sadā naiṣkramyacittatvaṃ buddhakāyagatā spṛhā // 1-49 //  [7] dharmasya deśanā satyaṃ daśamaṃ vākyamiṣyate /  jñeyaṃ ca parikarmaiṣāṃ svabhāvānupalambhataḥ // 1-50 //  'daśadhā' iti daśavidhena /  taccāśayādi //
[8] śīlaṃ kṛtajñatā kṣāntiḥ prāmodyaṃ mahatī kṛpā /

'dānādike ' iti pāramitāsu /  'aṣṭama' grahaṇādaṣṭāveva parikarmāṇi dvitīyāyām /  [9] atṛptatā śrute dānaṃ dharmasya ca nirāmiṣam /  buddhakṣetrasya saṃśuddhiḥ saṃsāroparikheditā // 1-52 //  [10] hrīrapatrāpyamityetat pañcadhāmananātmakam /

[11] śikṣāya aparityāgaḥ kāmānāṃ vijugupsanam /  nirvitsarvāstisaṃtyāgā[vana]valīna[tvān]pekṣate // 1-54 //  vanasya ('vānāśā)  araṇyavāsastatkāryatvāt /  'tuṣṭiḥ' santuṣṭiḥ /  'dhuta' guṇa 'saṃlekhasya' 'sevanaṃ' anutsargaḥ /  'nirvitsarvāstisaṃtyāgau' iti nirvedaḥ sarvasatāṃ tyāgaśca /
ātmotkarṣaparāvajñe karmamārgān daśāśubhān // 1-55 //  [13] mānaṃ stambhaṃ viparyāsaṃ vimatiṃ kleśamarṣaṇam /
śrāvakaspṛhāyāḥ pratyekabuddhaspṛhāyāḥ parita(tra)  sanacittasya ca parivarjaka iti trayaḥ /
yācitasyānabalīnacittatā,  sarvasvatyāge 'pyadaurmanasya,  daurbalyepi na yācakānāṃ kṣepa iti trayaḥ /
ebhirdvādaśabhirdharmaiḥ ṣaṣṭhiṃ bhūmiṃ prāpnoti /  [16] ātmasattvagraho jīvapudgalocchedaśāśvate /  nimittahetvoḥ skandheṣu dhātuṣvāyataneṣu ca // 1-59 //

[23] [sarvasattvamanojñāna] mabhijñākrīḍanaṃ śubhā /  pariśuddhetyarthaḥ /  'aṣṭādhā' iti vacanāt āṣṭaveva parikarmāṇyaṣṭamyām /  tadyathā /  sarvasattvacittānupraveśaḥ /  abhijñācittā [nukriḍanam / ] /  buddhakṣetraniṣpādanam /
devādirutajñānam /  paripūrṇaṃ pratibhānam /  garbhāvakrāntisampat /  kulasaṃpat /  jātisaṃpat /

[27] navabhūmīratikramya buddhabhūmau pratiṣṭhate /  yena jñānena sā jñeyā daśamī bodhisattvabhūḥ // 1-70 //  'navabhūmīḥ' iti gotrādibhūmiḥ /  tatra gotrabhūmiḥ nirvāṇagotrakāṇam /  aṣṭamakabhūmiḥ śrotaāpattiphalapratipannakasya /

saiva ṣaḍvidhā pratyekabuddhasya /  bodhisattvabhūmiḥ bodhisattvasya /  pūrvoktā navabhūmayaḥ /  etā navabhūmīratikramya yena jñānena bodhisattvo buddhabhūmau pratiṣṭhito bhavati sā daśami bodhisattvabhūmiḥ /  iti bhūmisambharaḥ /
prati[pakṣa]madhikṛtya śāstram-  [28] pratipakṣo 'ṣṭadhā jñeyo darśanābhyāsamārgayoḥ /  grāhyagrāhavikalpānāmaṣṭānāmupaśāntaye // 1-71 //

ataḥ śāstram-  [69] evaṃ kṛtvā yathokto vai jñeyaḥ sarvajñatānaye /  ayaṃ vibhāgo niḥśeṣo vipakṣapratipakṣayoḥ // 3-7 //  'yathoktaṃ' iti /  yathokto vibhāgaḥ 'sarvajñatānaye ' /  sarvo 'yaṃ 'vipakṣapratipakṣayoḥ' veditavyaḥ /  tathā hi /  saṅga upalambho vikalpaḥ /
ākāraḥ samacittādisteṣveva daśadhoditaḥ // 4-35 //  ata āha / atha khalvityādi yāvadahaṃ nātha iti /
[96] mūrdhagaṃ  etadāha svayaṃ cetyādinā /  pāpāni daśakuśalāni /  pāpebhyo nivṛttau viratau /  parijayo 'bhyāsaḥ /

ataḥ śāstram-  [97] nirvedhāṅgānyupādāya darśanābhyāsamārgayoḥ /  ye bodhisattvā vartante so 'trāvaivartiko gaṇaḥ // 4-38 //  'atra' iti mahāyāne /  vivartāya prabhavati vaivartikaḥ /  na tathetyavaivarktiko 'vinivartanīyaḥ /  athāsya nirvedhabhāgīyeṣu sthitasya kati liṅgānītyata āha /
atha katame rūpādinivṛttyādayaḥ?  [99] rūpādibhyo nivṛttiśca vicikitsākṣaṇakṣayau /
ātmānaḥ kuśalasthasya pareṣāṃ tanniyojanam // 4-40 //  [100] parādhāraṃ ca dānādi gambhīre 'rthepyakāṅkṣaṇam /
maitraṃ kāyādyasaṃvāsaḥ pañcadhāvaraṇena ca // 4-41 //  [101] sarvānuśayahānaṃ ca smṛtisamprajñatā śuci /  cīvarādiśarīre ca kṛmīṇāmasamudbhavaḥ // 4-42 //
tgt_original: བྱམས་ལུས་སོགས་དང་སྒྲིབ་པ་ནི་༎ རྣམ་པ་ལྔ་དང་མི་འགྲོགས་དང་༎ བག་ལ་ཉལ་ཀུན་འཇོམས་པ་དང་༎ དྲན་པ་དང་ནི་ཤེས་བཞིན་དང་༎ གོས་ལ་སོགས་པ་གཙང་བ་དང་༎ ལུས་ལ་སྲིན་བུ་རྣམས་མི་འབྱུང་༎

src_original: yayā teṣāṃ samagrāṇi kāraṇāni samyak parijñāya samyaganuṣṭhitāni /  ataḥ śāstram-  [186] dvātriṃśallakṣaṇāśītivyañjanātmā munerayam /
sambhogiko mataḥ kāyo mahāyānopabhogataḥ // 8-12 //  caturthena pādena sambhogikatve kāraṇamāha /
[187] cakrāṅkahastakramakūrmapādo jālāvanadvāṅgulipāṇipādaḥ /  karau sapādau taruṇau mṛdū ca samucchrayaiḥ saptabhirāśrayo 'sya // 8-13 //
[189] suvarṇavarṇaḥ pratanucchaviśca pradakṣiṇaikaikasujātaromā /  ūrṇāṅkitāsyo haripūrvakāyaḥ skandhau vṛtāvasya citāntarāṃsaḥ // 8-15 //
tāmadhikṛtya śāstram-  gatīnāṃ śamanaṃ karma saṃgrahe ca caturvidhe // 8-34 //  [209] niveśanaṃ sasaṃkleśe vyavadānāvabodhane /
[210] buddhamārge prakṛtyaiva śūnyatāyāṃ dvayakṣaye /  saṃkete 'nupalambhe ca paripāke ca dehinām // 8-36 //  [211] bodhisattvasya mārge 'bhiniveśasya ca vāraṇe /
bodheraṅgeṣvanāśe ca karmaṇāṃ satyadarśane // 8-38 //  [213] viparyāsaprahāṇe ca tadavastukatānaye /
